ISSUE.TITLE: After sending a message template test the Send immediately remains enabled until cache reset
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.70 Steps to reproduce the problem: Open any message template with a delay send in admin area and send a test email by clicking the "Test template" button. Once you return to the message template details page the Send immediately option will be enabled. Related to https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/5020
